Academic.description: In 2016 I successfully defended my diploma work entitled Management System for Health Trends and Analysis Units, obtaining a bachelor's degree in Computer Science Engineering. During the course of my studies, I passed a total of 70 courses, among which were Programming, Probability and Statistics, Simulation, Software Engineering, Artificial Intelligence, Database Systems, Operating Systems, etc.
Academic.institution: University of Ciego de Avila Máximo Gómez Báez

experience.jobDescription: Designed and implemented a system to keep track of the PCR samples and their results. Conducted diagnosis and resolved problems with the hardware of networks, software, and systems
